FindingName: [VULNERABLE] - Apps can Access Sensitive Company Data!!!
Description: Attackers can commonly use custom applications to trick users into granting them access to company data.
Remediation: 1. Connect to Microsoft Online service using Connect-MSOLService. > 2. Run the following Microsoft Online PowerShell command: Set-MsolCompanySettings -UsersPermissionToUserConsentToAppEnabled $False

References.Text: 14.6 Protect Information through Access Control Lists
